Math.text: list@(x, x ^ prime, x _ 1, x _ n, x _ (2 * n - 1), hat@(x), widehat@(x), x)
list@(y, y ^ prime, y _ 1, y _ n, y _ (2 * n - 1), hat@(y), widehat@(y))
list@(q, q _ a, q _ (list@(a, b)), [ but accidentally ] * q _ (a + b))
list@(f, f@(a), f@(q), f@(a, b), [ but ] * f * (a + b))
list@(a, b, c, a * b, b * c, a * b * c)
list@(varepsilon, varepsilon _ 1, T _ varepsilon, T _ varepsilon _ 1, T _ (list@(varepsilon _ 1, varepsilon _ 2, varepsilon _ 3)))

list@(a + b, foo, foo * x, foo * j)
list@(oddball@(a, j), oddball@(a * b * c, j))
list@(weird@(a, j), weird@(a * b * c, j))
